metadata.name: Suspicious Interactive PowerShell as SYSTEM
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of files that indicator an interactive use of PowerShell in the SYSTEM user context

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (lower(LOWER(file.path)) in ('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\config\\\\systemprofile\\\\appdata\\\\roaming\\\\microsoft\\\\windows\\\\powershell\\\\psreadline\\\\consolehost_history\\.txt', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\config\\\\systemprofile\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\microsoft\\\\windows\\\\powershell\\\\startupprofiledata-interactive')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of files that indicator an interactive use of PowerShell in the SYSTEM user context

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Administrative activity 2. PowerShell scripts running as SYSTEM user Reference: https://jpcertcc.github.io/ToolAnalysisResultSheet/details/PowerSploit_Invoke-Mimikatz.htm
